body.p: In the tree, every package has a Manifest file. This file lives in the same directory as the ebuilds for the package. The Manifest file contains digests (the current list can be found in metadata/layout.conf as manifest-hashes) and file size data for every distfile used by the package. This is used to verify integrity upon fetching them.
To generate the Manifest, use ebuild foo.ebuild manifest.
